name: io.github.jamiew/monarch-money-mcp
description: MCP server for Monarch Money personal finance - access accounts, transactions, budgets, cashflow, and more. Includes smart date parsing, batch operations, and spending analysis.

environmentVariables.name: MONARCH_EMAIL
environmentVariables.description: Your Monarch Money account email address

environmentVariables.name: MONARCH_MFA_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: Your TOTP secret key for 2FA (from Monarch Money 2FA setup)

environmentVariables.name: MONARCH_FORCE_LOGIN
environmentVariables.description: Set to 'true' to bypass session cache and force fresh login

tools.name: get_accounts
tools.description: List all financial accounts with balances

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.description: Get transactions with smart date parsing and filtering

tools.name: search_transactions
tools.description: Search transactions by merchant name or description

tools.name: get_budgets
tools.description: Get budget information and spending limits

tools.name: get_cashflow
tools.description: Get income and expense cashflow data

tools.name: get_transaction_categories
tools.description: List all transaction categories

tools.name: create_transaction
tools.description: Create a new manual transaction

tools.name: update_transaction
tools.description: Update an existing transaction

tools.name: update_transactions_bulk
tools.description: Update multiple transactions in parallel

tools.name: get_account_holdings
tools.description: Get investment holdings for an account

tools.name: get_account_history
tools.description: Get historical balance data for an account

tools.name: get_institutions
tools.description: List connected financial institutions

tools.name: get_recurring_transactions
tools.description: Get recurring/subscription transactions

tools.name: set_budget_amount
tools.description: Set budget amount for a category

tools.name: create_manual_account
tools.description: Create a manual tracking account

tools.name: refresh_accounts
tools.description: Request refresh of account data from institutions

tools.name: get_spending_summary
tools.description: Get aggregated spending summary by category/account/month

tools.name: get_complete_financial_overview
tools.description: Get comprehensive financial snapshot (accounts, budgets, transactions, cashflow)

tools.name: analyze_spending_patterns
tools.description: Analyze spending trends with optional forecasting

tools.name: get_usage_analytics
tools.description: Get tool usage statistics and optimization suggestions

securityConsiderations: This server requires your actual Monarch Money credentials (email, password, MFA secret) as Monarch Money does not provide OAuth or official API access. Credentials have full account access including viewing all financial data and making changes. Use with appropriate caution and never share your credentials.
